name: Venkata Ramana Reddy Duggempudi
tagline: AI Graduate | Data Preprocessing Expert | LLMs, CNNs, Vision Transformers
summary: AI Graduate, expert in Data Preprocessing and working on LangChain, fine-tuning LLMs, CNNs, Conversational AI and Vision Transformers for solving complex problems. AI engineer and had technical knowledge in advanced frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch to develop Deep Learning, NLP and image analysis solutions. Experienced in applying AI to real-world challenges with a focus on healthcare, finance and e-commerce domains.

education.school: University at Buffalo, The State University of New York

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Automobile Engineering
education.school: Hindustan Institute of Technology and Science

projects.title: LLMs in Health Science
projects.description: Fine-tuned MedBERT, MedRoBERTa, and Longformer to develop a language model for health reports. Achieved high faithfulness and consistency metrics.

projects.title: Bone Fracture Detection
projects.description: Developed a deep learning pipeline to identify fracture types in X-ray images, achieving 20.75% mean Average Precision (mAP) on 4,000+ images.

projects.title: Obesity Prediction
projects.description: Created a model to classify obesity into seven categories using feature engineering and neural networks.

projects.title: Improving Chess Strategies with Deep RL
projects.description: Designed and implemented RL agents in the PettingZoo chess environment, optimizing strategic decision-making.
